traits.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of his turn, Thrakkus can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against him have advantage until the start of his next turn.

actions.name: Greataxe
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (1d12 + 3 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Breath Weapon (1/Day)
entries: Thrakkus can use his action to exhale a 15-foot cone of fire. Each creature in the cone must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 6 (2d6 damage) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
